briefTitle: A Study of Herceptin (Trastuzumab) in Combination Chemotherapy in Patients With Metastatic or Locally Advanced Breast Cancer
officialTitle: 'A Study of the Effect of First Line Treatment With Paclitaxel and Myocet in Combination With Herceptin on Overall Tumor Response in Patients With Metastatic or Locally Advanced Breast Cancer and HER2 Overexpression.'
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Percentage of Participants Achieving Complete Response (CR) or Partial Response (PR) According to World Health Organization (WHO) Handbook for Reporting Results of Cancer Treatment
